property.name: text
property.value:
This is a test model that is used to test the correctness of request/spin interleavings Test Schedule:
Phone1: Request Twix at t=2.2s + every requestPeriod seconds thereafter Phone1: Receive Twix at t=8.2s + every requestPeriod seconds thereafter
Phone2: Request Twix at t=2.3s + every requestPeriod seconds thereafter Phone2: Receive Twix at t=15s + every requestPeriod seconds thereafter
Applause at t=3.2s + every applausePeriod seconds thereafter
ALPS location is sampled inside a 20x20 box each tick Home location is fixed The robot always reports a location of x=0.0,y=0.0
Stops at t=50 s
